name: Fingercrafts
description:
Bite, bleed and lick. The skin of the fingers around the nail have comforted and calmed.

Controls

Left mouse button MOVE - to control finger

Left mouse button CLICK - to bite finger

Left mouse button HOLD - to lick finger

T - Thumb

R - Index Finger

E - Middle Finger

W - Ring Finger

Q - Pinkie

http://seanographies.tumblr.com/ | @Seanographies | Source
